c8654b69-01d2-44d2-be63-3b26e6f3c051.content: Agent instructions now explicitly forbid embedding status labels in node content. Status must be tracked via status fields and status commands.

34870573-63f7-4f8d-8fd7-3b9dfddd27d2.content: Project bank is now self-hosting. memory-bank/ folder dissolved. All context lives in .pvrclawk/ managed by pvrclawk membank CLI.

9ea44bb3-6aef-4bd9-b8a7-bebd5860da96.benefit: Agents can resolve skills across Anthropic standard and story-driven formats using keyword matching over folder names and descriptions.
criteria: Support skill.json story-driven parsing with nesting awareness
Resolve repos from user-level config and env vars
skills resolve matches folder name and description by keyword
Expose CLI commands for list and resolve

12d41aed-8ac7-4085-970f-a6e2754c513c.benefit: Decay is governed by usage_count/total_frequency, not wall-clock time. Scoring formula: tag_match * weight * decay * freq_decay * mood * rules.
criteria: Link.usage_count tracks how often a link is traversed
Decay factor is link_usage_count / total_frequency, not datetime-based
Score formula: tag_match * weight * decay * freq_decay * mood_factor * rule_adjustment
Zero-score results are filtered out before ranking

604cf5ac-0e09-46b0-a4b8-c410ffc7708e.benefit: All membank internals (commands, core, models) live under src/pvrclawk/membank/. Root package is thin: app.py registers groups only. No membank logic at root level.
criteria: membank/ contains its own commands/, core/, and models/ subdirectories
No membank-specific imports in src/pvrclawk/app.py beyond registering the group
Universal utilities live in src/pvrclawk/utils/, not in membank

ec69eb3c-dabc-4c2f-bc28-89da4cff5be8.benefit: Every feature slice follows red-green-refactor. Unit tests for core logic, integration tests for CLI, e2e for full pipeline. No code before failing test.
criteria: Every new feature starts with a failing test
Implementation is minimal code to pass the test
Unit tests cover models and core logic, integration tests cover CLI commands

9e00eddc-55dd-4544-bce1-db46d8b16a3d.benefit: pvrclawk is a modular agent tool where feature groups are pluggable command categories. Root registers groups, each group owns its internals.
criteria: app.py only imports and registers Click groups
Feature packages are self-contained under src/pvrclawk/<name>/
Adding a new feature group requires no changes to existing groups

c00daa7c-1600-44b5-a045-53dafc4b7f46.test_scenario: Given story/feature/progress workflows, when updating progress, then status must be represented in the status field rather than prefixed in content text
c00daa7c-1600-44b5-a045-53dafc4b7f46.expected_result: Update AGENTS instructions to ban content prefixes like IN_PROGRESS:/DONE: and require node status updates

5b2970d1-2e83-44bb-ab82-6b97893c18ae.test_scenario: Given node list and node list-all, when --top N is provided, then results return only top N most recently updated nodes
5b2970d1-2e83-44bb-ab82-6b97893c18ae.expected_result: Add --top option to list and list-all with recency sorting

28bc4b90-5b63-4c18-a412-0fd1e98bd3f4.test_scenario: Given skills update command, when -a/--all is passed, then all configured repos are processed; without it command should prompt explicit intent
28bc4b90-5b63-4c18-a412-0fd1e98bd3f4.expected_result: Add -a/--all option and require it for bulk update

16456b40-fd3b-48cb-b2c7-828e2287f998.test_scenario: Given configured skill repos, when skills update runs, then each repo with .git performs git pull and non-git repos are skipped
16456b40-fd3b-48cb-b2c7-828e2287f998.expected_result: Migrate use-skill/update behavior into pvrclawk skills update

ef5db090-05e1-4114-899c-632ed0b3cd25.test_scenario: Given skills resolve, when options are passed, then output supports full detail view or path-only view
ef5db090-05e1-4114-899c-632ed0b3cd25.expected_result: Add --full and --path-only options to skills resolve command

d5cafe4e-d0a4-43f9-9298-641aaaacb368.test_scenario: Given nested story-driven skills, when listed or resolved, then name shows full parent path with '/' delimiter
d5cafe4e-d0a4-43f9-9298-641aaaacb368.expected_result: Display nested skill as parent/child path instead of leaf-only name

3d855ef5-58af-4f7e-b2a1-c4978ba2e8aa.test_scenario: Given root pvrclawk command, when skills group is invoked, then list and resolve commands expose discovered and parsed skills
3d855ef5-58af-4f7e-b2a1-c4978ba2e8aa.expected_result: Add src/pvrclawk/skills package, register in app.py, commands: skills list, skills resolve

c337723d-f080-464d-af41-e50413b71274.test_scenario: Given multiple skill repos, when resolving keywords, then matching uses folder names and descriptions with ranked results
c337723d-f080-464d-af41-e50413b71274.expected_result: Recursive scan of skills/ folders, format detection, keyword ranking: exact-name > partial-name > description

33f6e477-1dc0-46ed-af09-53a373dc098b.test_scenario: Given ~/.config/pvrclawk/config.toml and env vars, when loading config, then repo and group paths are merged and deduplicated
33f6e477-1dc0-46ed-af09-53a373dc098b.expected_result: Load skills_repo[], skills_group[], skills_format[]; merge MY_SKILLS_REPO and SKILLS_GROUP_DIR

8e944ec1-dc48-4112-b7fb-a6b5f20b816c.test_scenario: Given a skill folder, when marker files are present, then parser modules load either SKILL.md (standard) or skill.json (+ skill.md) story-driven
8e944ec1-dc48-4112-b7fb-a6b5f20b816c.expected_result: Separate parsers/standard.py and parsers/story_driven.py with format-specific tests

c89919bc-5dd3-4e2e-bb12-6d62541123d1.test_scenario: Given dual-format skill data, when loaded, then unified and format-specific Pydantic models validate parsed skill metadata and content
c89919bc-5dd3-4e2e-bb12-6d62541123d1.expected_result: SkillInfo, StandardSkill, StoryDrivenSkill, FeatureExt, SkillFeature, SkillsConfig models with tests

279942c1-0fa7-4929-b6b0-12f4c843ebed.test_scenario: Given node stats, when run, then shows count per type and total links

67ea2aa6-612c-48e4-aaa0-395afb24076d.test_scenario: Given config model in utils, when imported by any package, then single source of truth
67ea2aa6-612c-48e4-aaa0-395afb24076d.expected_result: Moved AppConfig from membank.models to utils.config, added auto_archive_active

802c2a84-b213-41ff-8609-3d3bebafa232.test_scenario: Given universal json read/write, when used by storage engine, then no duplicate code

b7ee4758-cecf-47b3-a393-a61c36b997e5.test_scenario: Given config auto_archive_active=true, when new active node added, then old actives become archive
b7ee4758-cecf-47b3-a393-a61c36b997e5.expected_result: Reads config.toml, auto_archive_active boolean, archives old active nodes

521fa539-f49c-444f-bff4-c539a40f0f6d.test_scenario: Given node add with --status flag, when story/feature/progress created, then status is set correctly

549f1b37-2736-46e0-8a8d-3ee9c1b8edec.test_scenario: Given prune, when index is rebuilt, then links_in is reconstructed from links.json
549f1b37-2736-46e0-8a8d-3ee9c1b8edec.expected_result: Prune scans links.json to populate links_in map

2bae0f2e-68a8-45f5-b516-dabd69da4e83.test_scenario: Given focus query, when no tag match, then zero-score nodes do not appear in results

2b6107e3-94c2-42c0-bdce-73153827d261.test_scenario: Given inbox nodes, when prune is called, then nodes are moved to named cluster files derived from top tags
2b6107e3-94c2-42c0-bdce-73153827d261.expected_result: Derives cluster name from tag frequency, rebuilds index

4ef41d5d-180f-42dc-bec8-ea1e25f59e49.test_scenario: Given node add memorylink with title, when created, then .md file is slugified under additional_memory/ and node stores path ref

00bc92bc-2ed5-4b96-a2bb-92f0ab7b3989.test_scenario: Given rule add with if/then DSL, when evaluated during scoring, then multiplier adjusts weight
00bc92bc-2ed5-4b96-a2bb-92f0ab7b3989.expected_result: Parser validates syntax, engine evaluates against tags and mood

abdcd52a-afed-42fa-9e06-75fd72a8ad9f.test_scenario: Given report mood tag value, when EMA applied, then mood.json updates with smoothed value

47871da6-3b6a-429e-926f-45b9a6510c0c.test_scenario: Given focus query with tags, when scored, then returns ranked nodes with 1-hop neighbor expansion

9a5fb02b-e9b0-4e2f-a56c-1449f85bd800.test_scenario: Given link add, when link weight is adjusted by tag combo, then links.json reflects new weight
9a5fb02b-e9b0-4e2f-a56c-1449f85bd800.expected_result: link add, link list, link weight commands

71c24841-acc6-4c93-b7e6-38771517abba.test_scenario: Given nodes saved, when index.json is read, then uid_file maps to cluster files and tags/types are indexed
71c24841-acc6-4c93-b7e6-38771517abba.expected_result: Nodes go to _inbox.json, prune reorganizes into named clusters

9319a748-e25b-4531-8e9f-a1e06fa45564.test_scenario: Given CLI invocation, when user runs pvrclawk membank --help, then all membank subcommands are listed
9319a748-e25b-4531-8e9f-a1e06fa45564.expected_result: init, config, node, link, focus, prune, report mood, rule

bb21fcce-64c8-4edb-99da-795f2c557930.test_scenario: Given root app.py, when a feature group is added, then it registers via main.add_command and nothing else lives in root
bb21fcce-64c8-4edb-99da-795f2c557930.expected_result: Root only imports and registers groups

30e0cb5b-fab3-4e52-9db5-390400da35dd.content: Universal utilities (json_io, config) live in src/pvrclawk/utils/. Feature packages re-export for backwards compat.

ac0e7658-2962-40fc-bdcd-a7c3e015e8a4.content: Python 3.12+, Click CLI, Pydantic models, NetworkX graph, Rich display, pytest testing, uv package management.

4aa161c4-f64b-4ae0-aa21-c6b26203f0d8.content: Cluster-based JSON files under .pvrclawk/nodes/. Index.json tracks tags, types, uid_file, links_in, clusters. Config in TOML.

e640c279-2819-4fa6-95fb-aaeffa224ee5.content: Decay is frequency-relative: usage_count/total_frequency. Not wall-clock. Score = tag_match * weight * freq_decay * mood * rules.

ea9963b9-9ed9-4fca-9e41-74cfee1e2553.content: Red-green-refactor for every slice. Unit tests for core, integration for CLI, e2e for pipeline. No implementation before failing test.

49eb05e8-acd9-4f2a-b68b-ff6135613022.content: All membank internals under src/pvrclawk/membank/. Root app.py is registration-only. No membank code at root core/ or models/.

41beeacf-3fc7-4cbf-9711-b1747a39ce3e.title: Architecture Reference
41beeacf-3fc7-4cbf-9711-b1747a39ce3e.summary: Full architecture spec covering CLI contracts, models, storage, scoring, rules, and mood

53f53a13-ebbc-4cae-9487-e11ad92187a9.content: Updated AGENTS instructions to require status tracking via status fields only, and removed content-prefix examples.

b5e240fc-55cc-4855-988a-878557a4a702.content: Added --top option to membank node list and node list-all. Results are sorted by most recent updated_at and limited to top N when provided. Added integration tests. 97 tests passing.

32199f07-53c0-4ebc-9fb9-f70f37c0bb0e.content: Add --top option to membank node list and list-all, sorted by most recent node update timestamp.

30cb856b-361b-44e2-bd27-4803ed36b34e.content: skills update now requires -a/--all for bulk updates. Without flag, command returns usage guidance. AGENTS skills instruction no longer includes update command (user-level operation). 95 tests passing.

19b00800-d3a1-4d98-a3d3-4d2a392d46e1.content: Add required -a/--all option to skills update and remove update command from AGENTS instructions.

3852eb31-216e-4406-a6ef-08ad09cc7285.content: Migrated use-skill/update behavior to native pvrclawk skills update. Command checks for .git and runs git pull only for git repos; non-git repos are skipped. Added unit/integration tests. 94 tests passing.

8481cb60-6d9e-403d-b20e-eb4fa80cdcb7.content: Migrating skill repo update behavior to native pvrclawk skills update command using .git detection and git pull.

72ee10d6-0922-4c29-bfb1-65a7e19b4b4b.content: Added skills resolve output modes: --full (includes path) and --path-only (path-only output). Added integration tests and kept default output unchanged. 91 tests passing.

2bb3b1fc-4858-4399-aa16-079cbc9c2c1f.content: Add skills resolve options for full detail output and path-only output. Starting with failing tests.

56ead100-209d-480a-a921-5233e573559e.content: Story-driven nested skills now display full parent path with '/' delimiter (e.g., use-skill/find). Added TDD coverage for scanner and human list output. 89 tests passing.

077dd0f8-9409-4365-a8c6-24d56e84fb67.content: Fix nested story-driven skill display to include full parent path using '/' delimiter. Starting with failing tests.

f45c5821-c258-43c3-b0d8-e5835c701b1d.content: Added human-readable skills listing via pvrclawk skills list --human. Full test suite now at 88 passing.

ac97399d-8ca4-450b-84a5-5294b20c1f9f.content: Implemented skills v1 with dual-format parsing (SKILL.md + skill.json), user-level config merge (~/.config/pvrclawk + env vars), scanner/resolver, skills list/resolve CLI, and AGENTS folder split. 87 tests passing.

4f4877c6-2485-4c57-94c4-8ec5b88c70fd.content: Story --criteria flag, shared render for criteria display, backfilled criteria on all 5 stories, AGENTS.md install-agnostic (no hardcoded uv run), README with full docs. 72 tests passing.

9cf198c5-a534-474f-abf2-0ed5f7cacca2.content: Fixed 6 of 7 evaluation issues. Zero-score filter, links_in rebuild, --status flag, configurable auto-archive, utils/json_io, utils/config. 71 tests passing.

acd0511c-752e-40f5-9e0a-1002738d5270.content: Added node get, node status, node list-all commands. Fixed focus to score by direct tag match. Shared render across all node output. 53 tests passing.

c85353f5-f8cb-4f2b-ba8b-10260ca13b09.content: Harden advanced cluster behavior. Integrate mood and rules into focus scoring path. Expand DSL parser coverage.

582cbf19-7476-486e-a93c-2e863b5332ce.content: Feature-scoped membank boundary applied. Init/config/node/link/prune/focus/mood/rules commands implemented with tests. 45 tests passing.

fa8bd552-a4ea-493e-9487-29849f30686d.title: Jira Integration Full Plan
fa8bd552-a4ea-493e-9487-29849f30686d.summary: Full phased implementation plan for Jira command-group integration, including architecture, command contracts, TDD slices, and security constraints.

3064c3eb-bfc4-4c09-a799-4ba5da5fe8d5.test_scenario: Given migrated execution nodes, when semantics are reviewed, then non-child historical items are classified as progress instead of subtask
3064c3eb-bfc4-4c09-a799-4ba5da5fe8d5.expected_result: Reclassify mis-mapped subtask entries to progress based on content semantics
